sentences.en: Most outfits crease a bit when you are travelling.
sentences.cn: 大多数的外套在旅行中都会有些起皱。

sentences.en: Pack your suit carefully so that you don't crease it.
sentences.cn: 把你的西装小心装好以免弄皱。

sentences.en: You have a deep, vertical crease down the middle of your earlobe.
sentences.cn: 你的耳垂中间有一条很深的垂直折痕。
